text: Aur isi tarah (aey Muhammad s.a.s) humne apne hukum se ek rooh tumhari tarf wahee ki hai. Tumhein kuch pata na tha ke kitaab kya hoti hai aur Imaan kya hota hai, Magar us rooh ko humne ek roshni bana diya jissey hum raah dikhate hain apne bandon mein se jisey chahte hain. Yaqeenan tum seedhey raaste ki taraf rehnumayi kar rahey ho
